title: Silvers across the world today be like

replies.body:
The year they make a victorious skin for yorick is when I'm going to go ham in ranked.
Kappa
You may have been sarcastic, but that is the only skin I would actually care about for ranked rewards.
That was this year for me.
nobody cares about this sivir skin m8

Says the guy in Silver. Sour grapes, perhaps?

Say what you want, a free skin is a free skin.

> [{quoted}](name=Narasimha,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=j7d4xEhA,comment-id=00080001,timestamp=2015-11-11T15:24:56.436+0000)
>
> Says the guy in Silver. Sour grapes, perhaps?
> 
> Say what you want, a free skin is a free skin.

https://i.imgur.com/htNSoiX.png im not proud of the account so i dont use it. 

i can also pull a massive amount of threads where everybody voiced how the sivir skin was lame and stupid

dont make me put you're dumbass on blast

> [{quoted}](name=F03,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=j7d4xEhA,comment-id=000800010001,timestamp=2015-11-11T15:43:20.952+0000)
>
> https://i.imgur.com/htNSoiX.png im not proud of the account so i dont use it. 
> 
> i can also pull a massive amount of threads where everybody voiced how the sivir skin was lame and stupid
> 
> dont make me put** you're **dumbass on blast

Oh the irony
Took time out of my day just to log in and tell you that you're fucking stupid and bad at English.

> im fucking correct

oh wow.

dumbass. the ass is his. possessive. think. 

I mean, i don't care about grammar on the boards but you should at least understand what he's insulting you about.

> [{quoted}](name=Mcprowlington,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=j7d4xEhA,comment-id=000800010001000000000000,timestamp=2015-11-11T15:49:42.365+0000)
>
> oh wow.
> 
> dumbass. the ass is his. possessive. think.

re read my post before you make another stupid comment please.

You understand that "you're" is the shortened version of "you are?"

> dont make me put you're dumbass on blast

so your comment means "don't make me put you are dumbass on blast?"

> re read my post before you make another stupid comment please.

Trying to be really patient with you here.

you are dum dum

hoo hoo hoo

*bangs sticks together*
I didn't like it much, either, so I didn't feel inclined to even try to climb to Gold. No need to be so judgmental of another person's opinion, man.

> [{quoted}](name=Narasimha,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=j7d4xEhA,comment-id=00080001,timestamp=2015-11-11T15:24:56.436+0000)

> Says the guy in Silver. Sour grapes, perhaps?

Were you on the boards when Viktorious Sivir was announced?

did you SEE the reception?
What is this 'Sivir' I've heard people calling it? Did they change Taric's name? Because that's who I saw in the thumbnail.

Oh don't get me wrong, the skin itself is nothing amazing.

But I'd take Lollipoppy if they gave it out. Free is free.

Only skin i would actually make an effort to get to gold for is the victorious elise either than that im good with only playing ranked during the last 5 days of the season xD ( but elise is gone q.q and shes never coming back)

If we didnt just have a "heres all the championship skins" Sale at end of season...id be midly salty, but we did...so its not all that exclusive when i can take my nice cushy salary and buy that shiz whenevs{{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}}
Yeah there could have been better. Giant golden wreath flying into people is neat, but Victorius Trist or Graves or something could have been cool too.
Viktorious
{{champion:112}} YES!
That would have been a  glorious ~~turn of events~~ revolution.
This is my first season where I reached gold, but I personally agree.
I detect much salt in this one
I'm Silver. Can confirm.

I'm not too sad about the Sivir skin.

The season they make a Vic. Nami skin is the season I cry if I fail.
Still waiting for a Shen skin.
I didnt expect to make it to gold this season because i made it into silver so late. Still im glad i made it out of bronze with my determination. Best of luck next year, eh?
*Making it into Silver fills you with determination*
Silver I's be like dat
Considering it's the hardest dealing with the smurfs end season. =p
I'm only sad because I was two games away from gold, then had a streak of retard teammates and broken enemy comps, and dropped straight down to S5. Got to S3 as the season ended.
Frankly I hope this is the end of the Victorious skin line. Next season let's give an end of season skin to everyone with chroma unlocks for each tier achieved.
That's, actually an ingenious idea.
{{champion:32}}

The only Victorious skin I could see myself actually using is Morgana's, and I didn't even start playing until season four was over. With Janna, I couldn't ever see myself choosing Victorious over Forecast. With Elise, I don't ever play her, so a skin would be useless to me. With Jarvan IV, I simply don't like the skin. And with Sivir, I don't like it, and wouldn't really ever use it either due to the fact that a) I almost never ADC and b) I'd rather play another ADC like Graves or Varus whenever I do.

Had it been announced that it'd be a support or top lane Victorious skin, I would totally have tried to climb to gold. Once I heard it was gonna be an ADC, I didn't care enough to put in the effort, especially with it being so near the end of the season.
I rather like the elise skin

It's a nice enough skin. I just barely jungle and she's not my sort of champion at all. I feel it'd take playing her to mastery level 5 and beyond for me to just not suck with her. So I'd get nothing out of that skin if I had it.
I don't use the skin at all but it is a nice one. So same boat
I missed the victorious Elise skin and I main her ;-;
This actually gave me less motivation to hit Gold then I wanted. I really don't care for Sivir and her play style sadly. Although, it sucks this will be the one Sivir skin I won't own D:
Don't worry she'll come back with a phoenix skin

¯\_(ツ)_/¯ 

Never cared, never will. An ugly free skin is not enough of a motive for me to go through all the trolling, AFKing, flaming and raging.

Edit: anyone seen my right arm?
Im not sad about the end of season rewards at all. That skin is ugly lol
I didn't care so much about the skin as I did the cool loading screen border. I ended up Silver V and I can say I'm proud I didn't finish in Bronze.
The skin's pretty bad. I wouldn't miss it.

I'm Silver II (placement games only OP), have every Sivir skin and yet I play ADC once a month. I don't even give a F about the Victorious Sivir skin tbh :/ "But, you have all Sivir skins but this one!" Yeah well every single skin I have is a result of self mystery gifting when available. Feels a lot more satisfying when you get really expensive ones.

Make a victorious wukong or victorious talon. Then I may consider going further than my 10 placement games.
